posts.post_content:
indeed, combine [lord of the pit](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=lord of the pit ) or [xathrid demon](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=xathrid demon ) and the necessary token generators and you've got a win, especially in multiplayer.
  
or [thopter foundry](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=thopter foundry ) would be an easier win.
  
but you should have something better by turn 7 really...

Posted By: mutantman (1/29/2010 2:53:25 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
7 for a 5/4 flying that does absolutely nothing until something else dies.  
  
I'd venture to guess what will die first; your other creatures or it.  
  
Simply put, it's something that requires an advantage and mana investment with little payoff. Besides, if you're running Vamps and haven't won (or lost) by the time you have the mana to cast this thing ([Crypt of Agadeem](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Crypt of Agadeem) withstanding), shame on you.  
  
[Kalastria Highborn](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Kalastria Highborn) has a better "stuff dies so cool stuff happens" effect anyway.
